name: ITK Occupational History
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which is part of a subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK; a set of codes which represent Disciplines and Occupations. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Occupation' subset with subset original id 6661000000133; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Occupation simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset id 999001571000000109.
